backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister implementing authorization, user profiles, product/catalog models, carts, orders, and initialization with demo data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark themes, and global element styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application configuring TanStack Router routes, theme provider, authentication, and profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or editing products with form validation and category selection.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects routes by checking authentication and admin status, showing alerts or loading states until access is validated.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for creating a user profile with name and optional email, submitting via a save mutation.
frontend/src/components/feedback/ErrorAl: Displays a styled error alert with a title and message.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper providing top navigation, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with branding, links, and design credits.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Top navigation bar with links, cart status, user menu, admin link, and authentication handling.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Displays a product’s image, title, description, price, and stock status in a navigable card.
Shows a grid of products or skeleton loaders, with a fallback message when empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context using Internet Identity, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, products, categories, cart data, and related mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables plus base styles.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides client-side validation for product forms, checkout forms, and quantity inputs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccountPage.tsx: Displays user profile details and quick actions, including logout and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin overview displaying totals for products, orders, revenue, and navigation to management pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin view listing all orders with customer info, totals, and links to order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page listing products with add, edit, delete, and demo initialization actions using dialogs and query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Shows cart items with product details, supports quantity updates and removal, and displays cart totals.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Handles checkout flow including address input, validation, order submission, and order summary display.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero banner, popular products, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and provides navigation to orders or continued shopping.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a single order, including items, totals, and shipping info, fetched by orderId.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists a user's past orders with dates, totals, and a link to each order's detail page.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product information, stock status, analytics, and allows authenticated users to add items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Provides a browsable product catalog with search, category filters, and sorting options.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and managing persisted or hash-based params.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and enabling plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing current features, requirements, issues, and image needs for an e‑commerce app.
